Class MapView

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridMapItemsListener, TimerListener, GridViewSelectionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MapView
extends View
implements GridMapItemsListener, GridViewSelectionListener, TimerListener
    This class defines the view of the map.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Zhe Zhao, JeanRaymondDaher, Chenglong Zhang
    See Also:
